TopicTitle: Teoman2's Sometimes Stock Craft *always take recommended dosage*

Articles.Content:
Yo. This is my stock craft.

[**RovR Mk1**](https://www./?u14p2ioaoqypslm)**:** Cute little rover, has two 1x6 solar panels, and has a radioactive gen.

 ![y2Hjh64.png](http://i.imgur.com/y2Hjh64.png)

[**Heavy A55 Bomber**](http://www./download/8ie7qa9r8cyb7yj/Heavy_A55_Bomeber.craft)**:** Good Bomber, nice speed, carries many bombs in cargo bay

![8oLTWY8.png](http://i.imgur.com/8oLTWY8.png)

Here are the bombs!

![bwpK7D0.png](http://i.imgur.com/bwpK7D0.png)

[**Bulldozer**](http://www./download/haz0h0pniy7e3ea/Bulldozer.craft)**:** It's what it is. With 12 jet engines and over 180 parts, it will fill all your bulldozereringtm needs! (may become sentient, use with caution)

![mk6Ccz8.png](http://i.imgur.com/mk6Ccz8.png)

[**Carrier Jet**](http://www./?yocr7818rox3c3a)**:** Space-Capable Space-Plane (durr). Has a Ion Probe onboard. The Ion Probe has enough Delta-V to crash on the moon. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) You're welcome.

![p5k8WOy.png](http://i.imgur.com/p5k8WOy.png)

More craft are coming to this page! Stay tuned folks!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-12T12:22:30Z" title="03/12/2015 12:22  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 12, 2015</time> by Teoman2**
For the bullozer, how did you use the old MK3 parts? Which versiona re you playing on?
He is using 0.90 because I see the new editor gadgets ... probably missed the ol' cockpit?
